title: Differences in phytoplankton population vulnerability in response to chemical activity of mixtures
content:
Environ. Sci.: Processes Impacts, 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4EM00249K, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
Talles Bruno Oliveira dos Anjos, Quyen Nham, Sebastian Abel, Elin Lindehoff, Clare Bradshaw, Anna Sobek
A chemical mixture caused diverse responses across five phytoplankton species. Analysis of lipid profiles and changes in neutral lipid content enhanced our understanding of the vulnerability of phytoplankton populations to chemical pollution.
